alert_data.description: Message processing lag on order-processing topic has increased to 45,000 messages and growing.

logs:
[2026-02-17 14:22:10] WARN [order-processor] Consumer lag increasing: 32000 messages
[2026-02-17 14:23:45] ERROR [order-processor] Database query timeout during message processing

root_causes: Consumer processing rate slower than producer rate
Database queries during message processing timing out
Insufficient consumer instances for current message volume
mitigation_steps: Scale up consumer instances from 3 to 10
Optimize database queries in consumer code
Increase consumer batch size for better throughput
ground_truth.actual_root_cause: Flash sale caused 4x spike in order volume, consumers couldn't keep up
